ResourceHeader.ResourceName: BepiColombo - Analytical Models - KT17 model - Mercury flyby #2
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: KT17 mercury magnetic field model for flyby #2
ResourceHeader.Description:
Magnetic field along S/C orbit at Mercury, custom calculation.
S/C, sampling time, distance of Mercury from the Sun (AU) and Anderson et al., 2013 disturbance index should be defined by user.
KT17 magnetic field model (Korth et al., 2017) model is used in calculations.

InformationURL.Name: Korth, H., Johnson, C. L., Philpott, L., Tsyganenko, N. A., Anderson, B. J. (2017). A dynamic model of Mercury's magnetospheric magnetic field. Geophysical Research Letters, 44, 10,147– 10,154.
Anderson, B. J., Johnson, C. L., and Korth, H. (2013), A magnetic disturbance index for Mercury's magnetic field derived from MESSENGER Magnetometer data, Geochem. Geophys. Geosyst., 14, 3875– 3886
